member.name: T:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash
member.summary: Set SMTP server details and receiver email fieds of this class instance to send crash reports directly in your inbox.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.SmtpHost
member.summary: Gets or Sets name or IP address of the Host used for SMTP transactions.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.EnableSSL
member.summary: Specify whether the SMTP client uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.Port
member.summary: Gets or Sets the port used for SMTP transactions.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.UserName
member.summary: Gets or Sets the username used for SMTP transactions.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.Password
member.summary: Gets or Sets the password used for SMTP transactions.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.ToEmail
member.summary: Gets or Sets email address where you want to receive crash reports.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.FromEmail
member.summary: Gets or Sets email address used by crash reporter if user don't provide her email address.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.Exception
member.summary: Gets or Sets exception that occur during application execution.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.CaptureScreen
member.summary: Specify whether CrashReporter.NET should take screen shot of whole screen or not.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.DeveloperMessage
member.summary: Gets or Sets custom message developer wants to send. It can be something like value of variables or other details you want to send.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.EmailRequired
member.summary: Gets or Sets if email is required to send the crash report.

member.name: F:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.CurrentCulture
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current culture to use by the library.

member.name: M:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.Send
member.summary: Sends exception report directly to receiver email address provided in ToEmail.

member.name: M:CrashReporterDotNET.ReportCrash.Send(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends exception report directly to receiver email address provided in ToEmail.
member.param: Exception object that contains details of the exception.
